title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Stan and the boys are in the Marsh garage belting out tunes, but their musical styles are scattered. Cartman sings lead, Stan and Kyle on are guitars, Kenny is on the drums

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: God damnit!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Stan, are you okay?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah, dad. We're just rehearsing our band.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Ooohhh, I thought a group of Vietnamese people were having their intestines pulled out through their mouths.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Heheheheheh heheheheheh.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: He's right, dude. We have to define our style if we're ever going to make a platinum album. I mean, ah I'm a fusion guy, but Kenny's background is more Latin Jazz.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: (What? Is it?)

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah, and I'm more hip-hop and R-and-B oriented.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I think out band better buy a whole bunch of music CDs to listen to for inspiration.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Inspiration. Wait a minute,  that's it. Inspiration, you guys. Don't you see?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: See what?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Our band should play Christian rock!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Christian rock?!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Think about it! It's the easiest crappiest music in the world, right? If we just play songs about how much we love Jesus, all the Christiand will buy our crap!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: That's a retarded idea, Cartman!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: It worked for Creed!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I don't wanna be in a stupid Christian rock band!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: You just start that way, Stan, then you cross over. It's genious!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Just get the hell out of here, Cartman! You're not serious and you're a detriment to the band!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh yeah?! I will bet you ten bucks that if I start a Christian rock band that I can get a platinum album before you guys do!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: You're on, fat boy!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Okay, fine! Ready?! First one to have a platinum album wins! Go!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: What a stupid asshole!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: The neighborhood, day. Cartman runs through the streets. He appears over a rise on one of the streets

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Platinum album! Platinum album! Gotta make a platinum album before Kyle!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh, hi Eric.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Butters! Get your drum set and meet me at my house! We have to make a platinum album! Hurry, Butters!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: ...Ohhh!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Token's mansion. Cartman runs up to the front door

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: No time to waste! Platinum album! Must beat Kyle!  Token! Get the bass guitar out of your basement and meet me over at my house!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: What?! We don't have a bass guitar.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Your family's black, Token! There's bound to be a bass guitar in your basement somewhere!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Cartman's house. He and Butters are in the living room. Cartman is at the piano, Butters is on drums.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Whoa, you sure seem with it, Eric. You must have some... ih-inspiration.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yes, the tears of Kyle Broflovski when he loses his ten dollars to me.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Hey, there was a bass guitar in my basement.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I told you, Token.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: So, what are we doing?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Gentlemen, we are about to embark on the most amazing, life-affirming, financially-windfalling experiences of our young lives.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Wow!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We are going to start... a Christian rock band.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Awww.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I'm out.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Wait!  Walk out that door, Token, and you'll regret it the rest of your life! Christians have a built-in audience of over one hundred and eighty million Americans! If each one of them buys just one of our albums at twelve dollars and ninety-five cents that would be-

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Two billion, three hundred and thirty one million dollars.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Still want to leave, Token?  Thank you.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: The Broflovski house, living room. Gerald and Sheila are on the sofa. Gerald reads a book, Sheila is knitting

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Dad, can I borrow three hundred dollars?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Three hundred dollars?? What in the world for??

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Our band can't find a stylistic direction to go in. We need to go down to the mall to buy hundreds of CDs to listen to so we can define our sound.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Sorry Kyle, we gave you your allowance already.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Ugh. Can't you see this is my dream?? Music is my life!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: It wasn't your life yesterday.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Hold it.  Pops, I've got the music inside me. It's in my soul. And I know my place is up on that stage. I'm gonna make it to the top. And I just want your blessing, Pops.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: The answer is no, Kyle.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Aw, come on Dad, don't be such a Jew!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Kyle, don't belittle your own people!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Aaaargh!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Hey dude.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: It didn't work! My stupid Jew dad won't lend me money for CDs!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: No, dude, it's cool. Kenny says you can download music for free on the Internet!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Really?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: (Yeah!)

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: You got a computer?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Stan's Dad's den, moments later. The boys are at the computer. Stan works the keyboard as Kyle and Kenny watch.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: See? Everyone on the Internet copies their music from their CDs, and then we can download them for free and play them on the computer!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: All right, cool.  Let's donwload some Metallica, and some Stevie Wonder.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: (Oh you forgot to get some Judas Priest.)

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Kenny's right. We should download some Judas Priest, too.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Judas Priest.  Wow! Downloading music for free is awesome!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: What the hell is that?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I don't know.  Let me go check.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Freeze!! FBI!!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Down on the ground! Down on the ground!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Hurry up! Let me see those hands!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Tango Teamus to Point Bravo! Suspects in custody!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Move move move move move move! All clear, men!  Get your ass going!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Move move move move move move! Move!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Kyle, what did you do?!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I don't know!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Cartman's house. He, Token and Butters begin to practice

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: All right, guys, this is gonna be so easy. All we have to do to make Christian songs is take regular old songs and add Jesus stuff to them.  See? All we have to do is cross out words like "baby" and "Darling" and replace them with Jesus. All right, Butters, give me a beat.  Okay, nice. Very nice. All right, Token, give me a smooth bass line.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I don't know how to play bass.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Token, how many times do we have to go through this? You're black. You can play bass.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I'm gettin' sick of your stereotypes!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Be as sick as you want, just give me a God-damned bass line!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: God-damnit!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: All right. Nice, fellas. Nice.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: I need you in my life, Jesus.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: I can't live without you, Jesus

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: And I just want to feel you deep inside me, Jesus.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Well done!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: United States Federal Bureau of Investigation, day. Inside, a detective reviews some reports on the boys' Internet activity. Stan, Kyle, and Kenny wait on the other side of the table

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Um, sir-

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Shiut up!!  You downloaded a lot of songs! Says here you even downlaoded Judas Priest? That's hard time you boys are lookin' at. You got anything to say for yourselves?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We d-didn't think it was that big a deal.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Not a big deal! You think downloading music for free is not a big deal?! Put your couts on! I'm gonna show you something! And I don't think you're gonna like it!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: A mansion, somewhere, day. The agent has taken the boys for a ride and arrived here. He leads them to the main gate

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: This is the home of Lars Ulrich, the drummer for Metallica.  Look. There's Lars now, sitting by his pool.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: What's the matter with him?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: This month he was hoping to have a gold-plated shark tank bar installed right next to the pool, but thanks to people downloading his music for free, he must now wait a few months before he can afford it. Come. There's more.  Here's Britney Spears' private jet. Notice anything? Britney used to have a Gulfstream IV. Now she's had to sell it and get a Gulfstream III because people like you chose to download her music for free.  The Gulfstream III doesn't even have a remote control for its surround-sound DVD system. Still think downloading music for free is no big deal?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We... didn't realize what we were doing, eh...

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: That is the folly of man. Now look in this window.  Here you see the loving family of Master P.  Next week is his son's birthday and, all he's ever wanted was an island in French Polynesia.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: So, he's gonna get it, right?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I see an island without an owner. If things keep going the way they are, the child will not get his tropical paradise.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We're sorry! We'll, we'll never download music for free again!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Man must learn to think of these horrible outcomes before he acts selfishly or else... I fear... recording artists will be forever doomed to a life of only semi-luxury.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Some bluffs by a beach, dawn. Cartman, Token and Butters scramble over some boulders to get to the beach. Seagulls fly overhead

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Almost there, you guys.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Ow...

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Why the hell did you tell us to dress nice to take us out here?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Because, Token, we have to take pictures for our album cover.  The key to a hot-selling Christian album is a flashy inspirational album cover.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Wow, neato! An album cover!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: This Christian album better make as much money as you said it would, tubby!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I'm going to kill you one day, Token.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: What did you say?!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Nothing. All right, guys, stand over there and look wholesome and cool. I have a timer on this thing so I can get in the shot too.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Cheese!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: No no no! Haven't you guys ever seen an album cover? You're supposed to be standing in random places, looking away like you don't care!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Cheese!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: No! Butters, you can't look happy on the album cover! That's not cool!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh...

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Token, look away to the right.  More. More!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Why the hell would I be looking way over there??

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: So it looks like you're too cool to care that you're on an album cover, you black asshole! Now just hold it! Our first album cover.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: Don't ever leave me, Jesus. I couldn't stand to see you go.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: My heart would simply snap, my Lord, if you walked on out that
text: door.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: I promise I'll be good to you, and keep you warm at night.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, why don't we just... shut off the lights.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: The FBI building, next day. The parents have shown up to retrieve the boys

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Thanks for releasing them to us, detective. Sorry for all the trouble they caused.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: It's all right. I think these boys learned their lesson.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Boy, I'll say!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: If you parents will just step over here, you can pay their four hundred dollar release and penalty fees.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Four hundred dollars? Just for downloading some songs off the Internet? It's not that big a deal.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Not a big deal, huh?! Come with me! I'm gonna show you something! And I don't think you're gonna like it!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Wugh, dude. I can't wait to just go back home and get back to band practice.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: (Yeah)

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: No! Didn't you guys learn anything? Look, if we make an album, all that's gonna happen is that people are gonna steal our songs for free off the Internet. We won't make a dime!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh yeah.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Until we get people to stop downloading music for free, I say we refuse to play!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: (Yeah!)

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Tom, I'm standing in South Park, Colorado, where the rock band, MOOP, has refused to play. The strike started yesterday and could go well into next week.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh hey guys. How's it going?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We're not letting you back in the band, Cartman! Fuck off!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I don't wanna be in your crappy band, guys. I just wanted to let you know, the album for my Christian rock band, Faith + 1, is about to go platinum.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: It is??

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: That's right. We already sold thirteen copies. You wanna pay me that ten-dollar bet, Kyle? Nyanyanyanya nya nya!  Hahahaha ha ha!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: You get a platinum album for selling one million copies, you fat turd!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: It's just a matter of time, my friends. This weekend is Christfest. The single largest gathering of Christians in the Midwest. Each one of them a walkng, praying wallet full of cash. And I'll be there selling my album.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: You'll never get a platinum album doing Christian rock, Cartman! It was a stupid idea then, and it's a stupid idea now!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah, you don't even know anything about Christianity.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I know enough to exploit it. Just get that ten bucks ready, Kyle. Tata!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Go ahead! People will just download your songs for free on the Internet anyways!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: What a dumbass. Our band is way cooler than his.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: (Yeah.)

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Christ-fest, night. A stadium's parking lot is crowded with all sorts of booths selling stuff.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Psalm T-Shirts! Get a T-Shirt with your favorite psalm!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Leather-bound bibles. Show your faith.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yes, it's really the best Christian album that's evern been produced, actually..

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh, this will be great for my grandchildren. They need hip cool music, but with inspirational lyrics.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I think that's what the whole world needs, praise Christ.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Huh we're not really Christians, we're just pretendin' we are.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Butters, remind me later to cut your balls off.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: All right, everyone! Welcome to Christfest 2003!  are you ready for some live music?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah Jesus!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Then let's give it up now for one of Christian rock's biggest bands! Trinity!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: The Shepherd and the Light, and His Word lifted me up

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: And I praise His Holy Name wherever I go.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Damnit! If we're gonna sell our hot Christian album, we have got to get on that stage!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Hey is this the way to the backstage?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Who are you?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We're the band Sanctified. We play metal and punk, but with lyrics that inspire faith in Christ.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah. We proved that Christian music can be tough and hard core.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah, you guys are real hard core.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: You bet your gosh-darned rear end we are!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: All right, uhh, Sanctified, you guys are up next.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah! Let's do it!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Sent down from Heaven! The Spirit and the Glory!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Eh hey guys, wait, uh, ..we wannaaa play with you before you go onstage.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Well, that, that's cool.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Always good to be praying before you're playin'.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Let's just go over here so we can hear ourselves better.  Lord, Father in Heaven, we thank you for all your blessings and we...

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Hey, Eric, I don't think they can get out.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: All right, Christians, how are you feeling tonight?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Praise Jesus! Praise him! My Lord!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Let's keep this salvation train going with the hot band, Sanctified!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: That's Faith + 1.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Uh. Uh apparently there's been a change. Give it up for ... Faith + 1!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: You know, Jesus? I've been thinking a lot about you lately and, well, that's why I wrote this song.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: I love you, Jesus. I want you to walk with me

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: the fans sway back and forth

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: I'll take good care of you baby. Call you my baby, baby!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: You died for my sins, and you know that I would die for you,
text: right?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: What's the matter, baby? You tremble at Jesus, baby!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: Your love... is my life! You know when Im without you, there's
text: a black hole in my life! Oo-ohhh!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: I wanna believe. It's all right, 'cause I get lonely in the night
text: and it's up to you to

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Kyle's house, day. The MOOP boys are still sitting on the steps, sulking, striking

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Dude, I didn't know being in a band was gonna be this tough.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah, it's tough. But it's times like these that... you see what your band is made of. We've gotta fight through the rough times like Journey!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Tom, we're now entering the second day of the rock band MOOP's refusal to play, and the second day of absolutely no other news to report on. In a recent poll we asked people if MOOP's refusal to play would stop them from downloading music off the Internet. One percent said yes. Two percent said no. And ninety-seven percent said, "Who the hell is MOOP?!" Back to you, Tom.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Hey, are you the guys protesting free Internet music downloading?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Hey, it's that Lars Ulrich guy!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: That's right. Metallica is behind you dudes a thousand percent!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We're gonna sit here and protest with you until free downloadin' stop, hyeah!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Tom, it appears now the musicians' strike is growing! As I'm speaking, more musicians are arriving! It looks like Alanis Morissette, Blink 182, Britney Spears, and dozens of others are going to join MOOP in not playing music. This is a veritable Strikapalooza!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Faith Records. Doves fly across the view. The building is bathed in bright sunlight

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Guys, we here at Faith Records were very moved by your performance at Christfest. You're one of the most talented Christian rock bands we've ever heard!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Thank you so much. Christ has really blessed us with talent.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Heeheeheeyeah.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We just have one question, though. We were looking over some of your lyrics, uh... "I want to walk hand-in-hand with Jesus on a private beach for two./I want him to nibble on my ear and say 'I'm here for you.'" Ih it seams you really love Christ.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yes, we sure do.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Eh no but ih it appears you are actually... in love with Christ.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Well what are you saying? That, that you don't really love Christ??

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Well uh of course I do. I mean I just-

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Well what's the difference?! You love Christ, you're in love with Christ, I mean, uh, what the heck is this??

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Uh, we'd just like to make sure the bands we sign are in it for God, and not for the money.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I resent that, sir! I have never in my life done anything just for the money! If I'm lying may the Lord strike me down right now.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Uhm, oh.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: That's- all we needed to know. Just, sign here and we'll get your album sold.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Commercial. A partly-cloudy sky is shown

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: K-tal Records  presents the most inspirational Christian rock band in the world! Faith + 1,  featuring the very best in good, wholesome Christian music.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh Lord you are my Savior! You know I miss you so much when you are gone.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: With great inspirational songs like "I Wasn't Born Again Yesterday," ""

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yes I may be born again, but I was wasn't born again yesterday. I wanna get down on my knees and start pleasing Jesus! I wanna feel his salvation all over my face!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: The CD is filled with instant classics. Who doesn't remember...

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: The Body of Christ! Sleek swimmer's body, all muscled up and toned!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
role: The Body of Christ! O, Lord Almighty, I wish I could call it
text: my own! You're one time, two times, three times my Savior... Whenever I see Jesus up on that Cross I can't help but think that he looks kinda hot...

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: This album is not available in stores and limited quantities are available, so order now!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Kyle's house, day. Various musical acts, some of them from Chef Aid, have gathered to strike agains free music donwloads with MOOP, including the Lord of the Underworld.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I can't take this much longer. Maybe we're just, not cut out to be in a band.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: You guys, we can't give up on our dreams now! As soon as this strike ends, we're gonna be the biggest band ever!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah, if we all give in now, people might never stop downloading our music for free!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I'm sure we're gonna get word any minute that people have agreed to stop.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Certified letter for the rock band MOOP?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: That's us!  "Dear MOOP. This letter is to inform you that Faith Plus One's debut album has just sold one million copies."

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: What??

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: "We cordially invite you to attend the platinum album award ceremony, which will be held tomorrow morning at ten. Details and proof of sales enclosed. P.S. Nananana na na. Hahahaha ha ha." He did it. Cartman got a platinum album.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Is this for real?? This is for real!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: He beat us. Because all this time we've been so caught up with how to protect our music that we forgot to just play.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: But why play if we're not gonna make millions of dollars.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Because that's what real artists do. People are always gonna find a way to copy our music and swap it for free. If we're real musicians, then we should just play and be stoked that so many people are listening.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Beside, maybe our sound would have gotten downloaded for free, but if they were good songs then people still would have bought tickets to see our band in concert.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: From now on, MOOP isn't about money. MOOP is about music! We're not striking anymore! Who's with us?!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: ...We're just about the money.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah, yeah.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: So... Dude, what are you gonna do about your bet with Cartman. Are you- gonna pay 'im?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I don't have a choice, dude. I'm gonna swallow my pride, face Cartman, and say "Congratulations. You were right" And I'm gonna give him the ten dollars. And hopefully, he won't make a big deal out of it.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Platinum album award ceremony, South Park, next day. Cartman has spent plenty of money to make this possible. He brings forth a parade complete with elephants, clowns, jugglers, a marching band, carnival rides, the works. Cartman stands on stage with Token and Butters before a curtain with a large image of his album cover printed on it

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Welcome! Welcome everyone! Please enjoy! The presentation should begin shortly.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Cartman, what the hell is all this?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Our platinum album ceremony. I spared no expense.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: But you spent all the money we made!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We're Faith Plus One, Token, there'll be plenty more money. Relax and enjoy, black asshole.  There's hors d'oeuvres and drinks by the Ferris wheel, everyone! Oh Kyle, guys, so nice to see you!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Let's just get this over with, Cartman. You won the bet, here's ten dollars.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh nonononono, not yet, Kyle. Hold on.  Everyone! Everyone, can I have your attention please?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: We like to praise Christ!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yes, yes, thank you thank you. Praise Him. I think we're ready to start now.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Welcome to the presentation ceremony for Faith Plus One.  And now to present the award, here's Michael Collins.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: This is the worse day of my life.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Ahhh, this is the best day of my life.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Boys, in recognition for over one million records sold, the Christian Recording Industry is please to present you with this Myrrh album.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Thank you very uh- wah? Myrrh album?

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: I thought albums win either gold or platinum.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Nono, in Christian rock, our albums go gold and frankincense and myrrh. Congratulations!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Ha! Our bet was that you would get a platinum album, not a myrrh album! I don't owe you anything, fat boy!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: You mean to tell me I could never get a platinum album with a Christian rock band?!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: No, but you can go double myrrh.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: GOD DAMNIT!!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Oh, please don't take the Lord's Name in vain.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Who cares?! I can never win my bet because you stupid assholes don't give out platinum albums!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: But you spread the Word of the Lord. You've brought faith in Jesus.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: OH, FUCK JESUS!!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Eric, I-I'm pretty sure you shouldn't say the F-word about-uh Jesus.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Yeah. You're gonna hurt the band.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Who fuckin' cares, Token?! I could never beat Kyle now! I'll say it again! Fuck Jesus!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: My ears are bleeding!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Good job, dickhead! You lost the entire audience!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Ah, fuck you, Token! You black asshole!

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Hm. Guess he got what he deserved.

title: CHRISTIAN ROCK HARD
text: Fuck you, Eric.
